channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Distress Investing: Crime Scene Investigation
item.description: In the underbelly of private markets lies the main culprit behind corporate failures: defective capital structuring.

item.title: Ken Griffin chips in to fund record-breaking $12 million contract for new US men’s soccer coach
item.description: The two year-deal is worth $6 million a year, making Pochettino the highest-paid coach in US soccer history.

item.title: Biden admin proposes 2-year delay of enforcement of ID rules to board planes day after 9/11 anniversary
item.description: The Biden administration proposed a new rule Thursday that does not extend the REAL ID May 7, 2025 deadline but would delay full enforcement to 2027.

item.title: Key report shifts Montana Senate race to 'lean Republican'
item.description: The nonpartisan Cook Political Report shifted Montana's pivotal Senate race from "toss-up" to "lean Republican," signifying the GOP is a favorite to w...

item.title: Paul Mellon and His Ponies, at Saratoga’s Racing Museum
item.description: No horse hockey here, only a solid, fascinating history of thoroughbred sport.

item.title: Kirby’s Reply-All Rebuff Of Veterans Confirms The Biden Administration’s Disdain For Our Military
item.description: Biden, Harris, and Kirby, not Trump, are the ones who repeatedly show contempt for men and women who have risked their lives for the country.

item.title: Revisiting the Factor Zoo: How Time Horizon Impacts the Efficacy of Investment Factors
item.description: Don't ignore serial dependencies in your factor portfolio.

item.title: Amex Delta credit cards raise welcome bonus on all cards, earn up to 110,000 SkyMiles
item.description: Big changes coming to the Delta Amex suite of credit cards. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Nikki Haley slams PAC using her name to support Harris as group targets Wisconsin Republicans
item.description: Nikki Haley condemned a group called Haley Voters for Harris for its campaign to target voters who supported the former U.N. ambassador in the 2024 GO...

item.title: RFK Jr. says Trump might lose support from independents after debate
item.description: Former independent presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. suggested Tuesday's debate cost former President Donald Trump support in the polls.

item.title: We Need Billionaires in Space
item.description: The first private space walk in history promises to be the beginning of private crews’ expanding humanity’s reach into the stars.

item.title: Withdrawing Support For Trump Would Be Political Suicide For The Pro-Life Movement
item.description: As Donald Trump and J.D. Vance try to win over swing voters, some pro-life leaders are busy dispiriting pro-life voters.

item.title: How Machine Learning Is Transforming Portfolio Optimization
item.description: Using machine learning algorithms in portfolio optimization is a growing trend that investors should pay attention to.

item.title: Verizon to lay off almost 5,000 employees in nearly $2 billion cost-cutting move
item.description: Over half of the employees concerned will exit in September and the rest by the end of March, according to the statement.

item.title: No taxpayer dollars for illegal immigrant gender surgeries under new House GOP bill
item.description: A group of House Republicans is pushing to block federal dollars from being used for illegal immigrants to receive gender transition surgeries.

item.title: Harris and Trump are jockeying for battleground states after their debate
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump are making a beeline for swing states that they hope to flip in their favor this year, ...

item.title: The States Are Dangerously Dependent on Medicaid-Expansion Dollars
item.description: As some of the last holdout states consider accepting the Obamacare-expansion deal, the risks of the program are becoming apparent.

item.title: Dangers and Opportunities Posed by the AI Skills Gap in Investment Management
item.description: AI is more than just another technology. It is a transformative force with the potential to redefine investment management. The industry's most signif...

item.title: Nasdaq CEO: U.S. economic growth would be 0.5% higher if it weren’t for fraud
item.description: Nasdaq's research shows how financial crime is an invasive drag on the U.S. economy.

item.title: Top handicapper gives GOP's Tim Sheehy edge against Democrat Jon Tester in Montana race shift
item.description: The second political handicapper in a matter of days has shifted Montana's Senate race in favor of Republicans as incumbent Sen. Jon Tester falls behi...

item.title: DHS proposes another two-year delay in full Real ID compliance
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security said Thursday that it wants to start prodding people to use Real ID-compliant identification next year but will gr...

item.title: The Constitutional Quandary Only School Choice Can Resolve
item.description: Forcing religious families to pay taxes for secular public schools and for education consistent with their beliefs cannot stand.

item.title: Latest Covid Shots Released Without Safety Data Under 4.5-Year-Old ‘Emergency’
item.description: HHS and the FDA should be leading the world in health care policy, not being over one year behind the curve.

item.description: Big data-driven AI in financial services is a technology that augments human capabilities. We are living in countries governed by the rule of law, and...

item.title: SEC signals Ethereum is not a security in settlement with eToro
item.description: The Gensler-led agency is allowing eToro to continue trading services for Ether, along with Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash.

item.title: Protectionist Laws an Overlooked Cause of Supply-Chain Disruptions
item.description: Globalization can’t solve everything, but reducing trade barriers can lessen their harm and help keep the economy humming.
